list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large juicy tropical fruit consisting of aromatic edible yellow flesh surrounded by a tough segmented skin and topped with a tuft of stiff leaves.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: roughly chop the pineapples and apricots
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đại khái chặt dứa và quả mơ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the widely cultivated tropical American plant that bears the pineapple. It is low-growing, with a spiral of spiny sword-shaped leaves on a thick stem.
